name: Buttery Blackberry Custard
description:
The combination of LB Vanilla Ice Cream and FLV Vanilla Pudding somehow combines to form a lovely rich eggy custard base.

Blackberry and Boysenberrry form a sweet Blackberry Sauce.

Biscuit adds a buttery'ness to the vape with a slight hint of cookie at the back end of the vape.
author: Freshepies

reviews.text: Wonderful recipe! This reminds me of fruit monster mixed berry. Which I loved. There is just the right balance of blackberry/ sweet currant to buttery custard note. Excellent full mouthfeel from LB VIC and the FLV pudding. INW biscuit is always great for that buttery crispy bakery bite! Thank you @Freshepies for a beautifully executed recipe!
I saw this and it looked so good I had to try it. I didnâ€™t have LB VBIC so I subbed with FW. Right off the shake this vape is outstanding, great flavors and a nice crispy buttery finish. Well done.
